page: IM39005: Quality Design And Control Laboratory

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: IM21003 Operations Research-1Exercises and experiments on variability of quality characteristics, construction of control charts for attributes and variables, work flow systems (push and pull types), analysis of sampling plans with sampling simulators, development of life testing plans, online quality control systems.
page: IM39005: Quality Design And Control Laboratory
